section.section:
The Commissioner may:
establish other areas of responsibility in the Administration; and
reorganize or abolish areas of responsibility as necessary to fulfill effectively the duties of the Commissioner.

text.section:
The Commissioner shall report to the General Assembly about:
the initial organizational structure of the Administration; and
any substantial changes in organizational structure.
The organization of each division shall be according to functional area and shall be designed for efficiency, service to the public, and effective regulation.
